---
title: "Initiate Call"
api: "POST /initiateCall"
description: "Initiate a single outbound call via third-party webhook"
auth: "bearer"
---

## Overview

Trigger an outbound AI call to a single contact. This endpoint is designed for third-party integrations and webhooks.

---

## Headers

<ParamField header="Content-Type" type="string" default="application/json">
  application/json
</ParamField>

<ParamField header="Authorization" type="string" required>
  Bearer token for authentication
  
  **Options:**
  - Regular JWT token: `Bearer <JWT_TOKEN>` (from login response)
  - Static batch token: `Bearer <BATCH_STATIC_TOKEN>` (never expires - contact support)
</ParamField>

<ParamField header="Cookie" type="string">
  Alternative authentication via cookie: `token=<JWT_TOKEN>`
  
  Use this if not using Authorization header
</ParamField>

<ParamField header="Origin" type="string">
  Origin of the request (must be whitelisted)
  
  Example: `https://vb-seamless-dev-backend.oriserve.com/`
</ParamField>

<ParamField header="User-Agent" type="string">
  Browser or client user agent
</ParamField>

---

##  Authentication

<Note>
  This endpoint supports **two authentication methods**:
  
  1. **Static Batch Token** (Recommended for integrations): Never expires, contact support to obtain
  2. **Regular JWT Token**: Obtained from login endpoint, expires after 24 hours
</Note>

---

##  Request Body

<ParamField body="campaignId" type="string" required>
  Campaign ID to associate call with
  ```
  b885b212-d3bb-482f-a29d-508d2a8929ac
  ```
</ParamField>

<ParamField body="notificationWebhookUrl" type="string">
  Optional webhook URL for call status notifications
  ```
  https://overindulgently-unbreezy-colleen.ngrok-free.dev/getCallbackdata
  ```
</ParamField>

<ParamField body="userName" type="string" required>
  Name of the user being called
  ```
  Faiz
  ```
</ParamField>

<ParamField body="userPhoneNumber" type="string" required>
  Recipient phone number (without + prefix)
  ```
  919625147093
  ```
</ParamField>

<ParamField body="metaData" type="object" required>
  Custom data to pass to AI during call
  ```json
  {
    "due_amount": "4500",
    "due_amount_half": "2250",
    "due_date": "2025-09-03",
    "allocation_month": "2025-09-01",
    "company_name": "H-D-B financial services",
    "loan_id": "1234",
    "company_id": "23332000",
    "communication_level": "applicant",
    "product_description": "two wheeler"
  }
  ```
</ParamField>

---

## Response

### Success Response (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Call initiated successfully",
  "data": {
    "call_uuid": "call-uuid-abc123",
    "status": "initiated",
    "userPhoneNumber": "919625147093",
    "campaignId": "b885b212-d3bb-482f-a29d-508d2a8929ac",
    "initiated_at": "2024-01-16T10:30:00Z"
  }
}
```

### Error Response (400):
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Invalid phone number",
  "error": "Phone number must be valid"
}
```

---

## Code Examples

### cURL:
```bash
curl -X POST "https://vb-seamless-dev-backend.oriserve.com/initiateCall" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "campaignId": "b885b212-d3bb-482f-a29d-508d2a8929ac",
    "notificationWebhookUrl": "https://overindulgently-unbreezy-colleen.ngrok-free.dev/getCallbackdata",
    "userName": "Faiz",
    "userPhoneNumber": "919625147093",
    "metaData": {
      "due_amount": "4500",
      "due_amount_half": "2250",
      "due_date": "2025-09-03",
      "allocation_month": "2025-09-01",
      "company_name": "H-D-B financial services",
      "loan_id": "1234",
      "company_id": "23332000",
      "communication_level": "applicant",
      "product_description": "two wheeler"
    }
  }'
```

### JavaScript:
```javascript
const axios = require('axios');

async function initiateCall(campaignId, userName, userPhoneNumber, metaData = {}, notificationWebhookUrl = null) {
  try {
    const payload = {
      campaignId: campaignId,
      userName: userName,
      userPhoneNumber: userPhoneNumber,
      metaData: metaData
    };
    
    if (notificationWebhookUrl) {
      payload.notificationWebhookUrl = notificationWebhookUrl;
    }
    
    const response = await axios.post(
      'https://vb-seamless-dev-backend.oriserve.com/initiateCall',
      payload,
      {
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json'
        }
      }
    );
    
    console.log('Call initiated:', response.data.data.call_uuid);
    return response.data.data;
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error:', error.response.data);
  }
}

// Example
initiateCall(
  'b885b212-d3bb-482f-a29d-508d2a8929ac',
  'Faiz',
  '919625147093',
  {
    "due_amount": "4500",
    "due_amount_half": "2250",
    "due_date": "2025-09-03",
    "allocation_month": "2025-09-01",
    "company_name": "H-D-B financial services",
    "loan_id": "1234",
    "company_id": "23332000",
    "communication_level": "applicant",
    "product_description": "two wheeler"
  },
  'https://overindulgently-unbreezy-colleen.ngrok-free.dev/getCallbackdata'
);
```

### Python:
```python
import requests

def initiate_call(campaign_id, user_name, user_phone_number, meta_data=None, notification_webhook_url=None):
    url = "https://vb-seamless-dev-backend.oriserve.com/initiateCall"
    
    payload = {
        "campaignId": campaign_id,
        "userName": user_name,
        "userPhoneNumber": user_phone_number,
        "metaData": meta_data or {}
    }
    
    if notification_webhook_url:
        payload["notificationWebhookUrl"] = notification_webhook_url
    
    response = requests.post(url, json=payload)
    
    if response.status_code == 200:
        data = response.json()['data']
        print(f"✅ Call initiated: {data['call_uuid']}")
        return data
    else:
        print("❌ Error:", response.json())
        return None

# Example
initiate_call(
    "b885b212-d3bb-482f-a29d-508d2a8929ac",
    "Faiz",
    "919625147093",
    {
        "due_amount": "4500",
        "due_amount_half": "2250",
        "due_date": "2025-09-03",
        "allocation_month": "2025-09-01",
        "company_name": "H-D-B financial services",
        "loan_id": "1234",
        "company_id": "23332000",
        "communication_level": "applicant",
        "product_description": "two wheeler"
    },
    "https://overindulgently-unbreezy-colleen.ngrok-free.dev/getCallbackdata"
)
```
